name: Pandora's Box
description:
The best way to experience the classic snake game on steam, with a new game mode where you'll need to escape from bullets coming from everywhere, make sure to catch as many stars and power-ups as your snake-like ship keeps growing, such as:
- Cutter: cut your snake in half.
- Timer: slow the speed down to standart as bullets move in slow motion.
- Portal: transform all walls around you so you can travel faster through the cage.
Progress through different types of enemies in arcade mode as you get closer to a final confrontation.
